name: 321Know
0:
”Alexa, ask three two one”
”Alexa, open three two one”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three two one
des:
321Know! makes it easy to make all of your Yes or No decisions, with a bit of suspense thrown in too!

Enable 321Know! for your Alexa-enabled device, and then whenever you have a difficult decision which requires a Yes or No answer, simply state the problem out loud, and then say 'Alexa, ask 321'

A Yes or No decision will be made for you by a series of secure Lambda algorithms tunnelled through Amazon's worldwide Cloud services data centers, with results calculated within three seconds. Alexa will give then you the decision it has reached, which you can take that into account as you make your decision, and then move on accordingly.

Never before has it been so easy to wield the power of comprehensive voice-control at such a high level of abstraction, streamlining decision-making as a key advisor to you in virtually any aspect of your life. 

Stop wondering what to do. Know the answer with 321Know!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
